name: Bus & Cable Car Simulator
summary:
Welcome to San Francisco! 
 
A metropolitan area in California on the west coast of the United States. 
Apply to the public transport and take place behind the wheel of a bus, articulated bus, trolleybus, cable car or even the trams. Altogether you have 16 highly detailed and animated vehicles at your disposal. Guide them through the huge, freely explorable game world. 
 
Discover hundreds of typical streets with their original slopes. 
Take on the everyday tasks of a public transport operator and use the many functions in the cockpit to meet the timetable on time. Always pay attention to the fuel gauge and condition of your bus. Take special tasks to fill up your pocket money and earn you one or the other reward.
